name: Fantasy Mosaics 19: Edge of the World
name_original: Fantasy Mosaics 19: Edge of the World
description:
Join the penguin family as they travel to the edge of the world to extend the mosaics color palette!

This thrilling adventure brings a new challenging collection of puzzles and will lead you
to explore a unique place along the way.

Help the alien lady penguin as she is taking the penguin family on this expedition to make new discoveries.


- Mosaic puzzles with an extended color palette

- Pixel art puzzle challenges

- Explore a new landscape

- Puzzles based on logic
